case_briefing.case_title: The Hunt for The Null - Digital Forensics Investigation

mission_overview.summary: A sophisticated cyber attack has been attributed to an individual known only as 'The Null'. Your mission is to analyze seized digital evidence and conclusively identify this threat actor.
mission_overview.background: The Null has been linked to multiple high-profile cyber attacks over the past year. Intelligence suggests this individual operates from a compromised personal laptop, using advanced malware tools for data theft and system compromise. This is our first opportunity to examine their primary operational device.
mission_overview.critical_importance: Identifying The Null is essential for national cybersecurity. This investigation will provide evidence for prosecution and help prevent future attacks by this threat actor.
mission_overview.success_criteria: A legally-compliant forensic report that conclusively identifies The Null's real identity with supporting digital evidence.

investigation_objectives.title: Establish The Null's Identity
investigation_objectives.description: Use digital forensics to determine the real identity behind 'The Null' persona
success_indicators: Real name identified from user accounts or personal files
Correlation between 'TheNull' username and real identity

investigation_objectives.title: Reconstruct Attack Timeline
investigation_objectives.description: Build a comprehensive timeline of malicious activities on the compromised system

investigation_objectives.title: Analyze Malware Arsenal
investigation_objectives.description: Document all malicious software used in the attacks

investigation_objectives.title: Map Network Communications
investigation_objectives.description: Trace suspicious network activities and external communications

investigation_objectives.title: Assess Data Compromise Scope
investigation_objectives.description: Determine what data was accessed, modified, or stolen during the attack

recommended_steps.title: Evidence Intake & Verification
recommended_steps.description: Begin with the Evidence Locker to verify all evidence integrity
key_actions: Verify hash integrity of all evidence items
Review evidence metadata and acquisition details

recommended_steps.title: Disk Forensics Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Analyze hard drive images for user artifacts and malicious files
key_actions: Examine user accounts and profile directories
recommended_steps.success_criteria: User identity leads discovered, malware files identified

recommended_steps.title: Memory Forensics Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Examine memory dumps for running processes and malware
key_actions: Correlate memory artifacts with disk findings
recommended_steps.success_criteria: Active malware processes identified, network connections mapped

recommended_steps.title: Network Traffic Analysis
recommended_steps.description: Investigate network captures for malicious communications
key_actions: Correlate network events with system activity

recommended_steps.title: Timeline Correlation
recommended_steps.description: Use Timeline Constructor to correlate findings across evidence sources
key_actions: Import events from all analysis tools

recommended_steps.title: Report Generation
recommended_steps.description: Document findings in legally-compliant forensic report
key_actions: Drag evidence into appropriate report sections
Provide clear conclusions about The Null's identity
recommended_steps.success_criteria: Complete forensic report with evidence citations

evidence_001.name: Laptop Hard Drive Image
evidence_001.significance: PRIMARY - Contains user accounts, personal files, and malware artifacts
evidence_001.analysis_focus: User directories, installed malware, deleted files, system artifacts
evidence_001.expected_findings: TheNull user account, personal identity clues, malware executables

evidence_002.name: RAM Memory Dump
evidence_002.significance: CRITICAL - Shows active malware processes and network connections
evidence_002.analysis_focus: Running processes, network connections, malware signatures
evidence_002.expected_findings: Active backdoors, C&C connections, malware behavior

evidence_003.name: Network Traffic Capture
evidence_003.significance: HIGH - Documents external communications and data exfiltration
evidence_003.analysis_focus: Suspicious connections, data transfers, C&C communications
evidence_003.expected_findings: C&C server IPs, exfiltrated data volumes, communication protocols

evidence_004.name: Web Server Access Logs
evidence_004.significance: SUPPORTING - Provides context on attack vectors and timing
evidence_004.analysis_focus: Attack entry points, reconnaissance activities, timeline correlation

general: Focus on establishing The Null's real identity - this is the primary objective
Look for correlations between evidence sources to build a strong case
Pay attention to timestamps across all evidence to reconstruct the attack timeline
The Report Generator uses drag-and-drop - drag evidence into relevant sections
technical: User account 'TheNull' likely contains identity clues in personal directories
Memory analysis will reveal active malware and network connections
Network captures show the external infrastructure used by The Null
Timeline correlation helps validate findings across multiple evidence sources
reporting: Executive Summary should highlight The Null's identified identity
Findings section needs technical details from all analysis tools
Conclusions must be supported by evidence from multiple sources
Proper evidence citation is required for legal compliance

scoring_guidance.perfect_score: 500 points - All objectives completed with comprehensive evidence correlation
scoring_guidance.high_score: 400+ points - The Null identified with strong supporting evidence
scoring_guidance.passing_score: 300+ points - The Null identified with adequate evidence support
scoring_guidance.failure: Less than 300 points - Insufficient evidence to establish identity

legal_considerations.chain_of_custody: Maintain proper documentation of all evidence handling
legal_considerations.evidence_integrity: Verify hash values and document any discrepancies
legal_considerations.methodology: Document all tools and procedures used in analysis
legal_considerations.citations: Properly cite all evidence in forensic report sections
